eventflagId.Wiki: Event flag for unlocking this Idol

bonfireEntityId.Wiki: EntityId of the Idol object, defined in the map

menuPageNo.Wiki: Which map menu will this Idol warp appear in?

isHome.Wiki: Is this Idol the home base?

blockCultId.Wiki: Changes the Ceremony Id when warping to this Idol

grayoutEventflagId.Wiki: Event flag that prevents you from warping to this Idol after it's already been unlocked

Self.Wiki: Settings for Sculptor's Idol menu and warps
